name: STALKR
description:
You are awoken at the peak of night, equipped with a torch to your right. There is a figure ahead of you. It doesn't seem human. Armed with a lit torch you decide to explore the island.

Collect the 8 bears left around the island.

You will be stalked by the creature, the game pace will change as you progress further, collecting more bears.

Enjoy :) Big updates to come: 

  • Developing the story
  • Buildings
  • More significant points (for better immersion)
